subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi broke Gerd Müller’s record for goals in a European club season, scoring a hat trick for Barcelona in a 4-1 win over Malaga on Wednesday night to raise his total to 68.
snippet: Lionel Messi broke Gerd Müller’s record for goals in a European club season, scoring a hat trick for Barcelona in a 4-1 win over Malaga on Wednesday night to raise his total to 68.
